alert.note: Alert for Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 27 at 4:53PM MDT until July 27 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHEASTERN WASHINGTON COUNTY...SPECIFICALLY FOR HILDALE... At 453 PM MDT, local law enforcement reported ongoing flash flooding in Hildale, and that most of the wash crossings in town have flooded. They have several road closures currently in effect. Between 0.5 and 1.25 inches of rain fell from earlier thunderstorms. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding is occurring. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, normally dry washes, urban areas, and streets. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hildale. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
